name: Mr Shotgun
description:
Mr Shotgun is a top-down arcade shooter! You can play it free here!

Latest Update

Alpha 0.2.1 - July 13, 2016

Started laying the groundwork for basically everything.

Early Alpha features

  • Fun and challenging combat, unique enemies.
  • Large selection of cool weapons.
  • Built-in map editor

Hardware Requirements

Mr Shotgun is not a very demanding game, but to run the game decently you will need:

  • A 64-bit operating system. (I'm too lazy to package for 64 and 32 bit)
  • 2 GB of ram.
  • At least a dual core CPU is a good idea.
